name: Payun²
description:
Controls:

  • Move: arrow keys or D-pad
  • Shoot: space bar or DualShock Cross / Xbox A / Nintendo B

29 May 2020 update:

  • First release candidate!
  • Added background music
  • Added a final boss
  • Added title and end game screens

20 May 2020 update:

  • Made the ship smaller and faster.
  • Enemy bullets are now slower and can be destroyed by shooting at them!
  • Tweaked the end of the level
